title: Javascript Developer
description:
Job Title: Middle JavaScript Developer


Company: SAQAYA


Location: Remote (Egypt based)


About Us:


SAQAYA is a dynamic technology company that specializes in delivering innovative technology solutions for UK businesses. We are on an exciting journey of growth and expansion and are currently looking for a Middle JavaScript Developer to join our team. This individual will be the cornerstone of our technical team, responsible for shaping and implementing cutting-edge solutions.


Position Overview:



We are seeking a Middle JavaScript Developer with a strong background in JavaScript development. The ideal candidate should have solid JavaScript experience and, ideally, prior experience with GrapesJS as a Content Management System (CMS). In this role, you will be the main technical point person, responsible for creating and maintaining technically robust solutions for our clients.


Key Responsibilities:


Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and develop innovative solutions.

Design and implement high-quality, maintainable code using JavaScript and relevant frameworks.

Be the main technical contact for projects, ensuring technical solutions align with client needs and project goals.

Contribute to the development of CMS-based solutions, with a focus on GrapesJS.

Troubleshoot and debug issues, and provide technical support for clients as needed.

Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, making recommendations for improvements and optimizations.


Qualifications:


Strong experience in JavaScript development with a proven track record of delivering technical solutions.

Ideally, prior experience with GrapesJS as a CMS.

Proficiency in web development technologies and frameworks.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Self-motivated, organized, and able to work effectively in a remote, international team environment.


What We Offer:


  • Competitive compensation.
  • The opportunity to work on exciting and challenging projects for UK-based clients.
  • A flexible, remote work environment.
  • The chance to shape and lead technical solutions for our clients.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.


How to Apply:

If you are a Middle JavaScript Developer with solid JavaScript experience and an interest in working with GrapesJS as a CMS, we want to hear from you. Please submit your resume and any other relevant information to Yurena@saqaya.com


Join SAQAYA as our main technical expert and contribute to the success of our projects. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Back End Developer
description:
Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a Back End Developer located in Al Jizah, Egypt. depth in Python, Node.js, Database Management, Machine Learning, and imbued with a passion for technological innovation? If this narrative resonates with your professional ethos, we are enthusiastic to extend an invitation for you to join our distinguished team. We are on a quest for a dexterous professional to join forces with us in the creation and meticulous maintenance of avant-garde web-based AI/ML models, ensuring a seamless amalgamation with our existing technological ecosystem. Your prowess will be a linchpin in engineering groundbreaking solutions that propel our company on an ascendant path of growth and industry leadership.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Engineer and nurture bespoke AI/ML models, harnessing the power of Python, Node.js, and pertinent libraries to drive innovation.
  • Architect and fine-tune robust scalable backend frameworks, dedicated to efficient data processing and storage, setting a benchmark in industry standards.
  • Forge a collaborative alliance with frontend developers to ensure a seamless integration, delivering an exceptional end-user experience that is second to none.
  • Design and sustain RESTful APIs, fostering smooth interoperability between applications, epitomizing the essence of fluid technological communication.
  • Implement and meticulously maintain high-performance, fortified databases, forming the bedrock of our secure and reliable data management infrastructure.
  • Craft clean, maintainable code with a staunch adherence to best practices, embodying the spirit of excellence and precision in every line of code.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve application conundrums, with a continual eye on the evolving landscape of industry advancements, ensuring our tech stack remains at the pinnacle of modernity.


Qualifications

  • A minimum of 2 years' tenure as a Backend Developer, with a focal expertise in Python, Node.js, AI/ML, and Database management, embodying a well-rounded tech-savvy professional.
  • Deep-seated understanding of Python and Node.js AI/ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Keras), symbolizing a mastery in AI/ML domain.
  • Proficiency with SQL and NoSQL databases, RESTful API design, and web application frameworks (Flask, Django), showcasing a versatile skill set in backend technologies.
  • Familiarity with scalable computing principles and cloud-based infrastructure (AWS and Azure), portraying a comprehensive understanding of contemporary cloud computing paradigms.
  • Exceptional problem-solving acumen, stellar communication, and interpersonal skills, epitomizing the essence of a team player with a visionary outlook.

title: Senior backend Developer
description:

title: Senior PHP Developer
description:
E2E County "TravWare" is a leading travel technology company that provides end-to-end solutions to travel organizations, including TOs, DMCs, TMCs, TAs, and SPs. Our ecosystem 2.0 principles help us to integrate AI and ML technology into our software, enhancing behavior economics, industry employees, and improving the economy of scale and actions. description:

title: Data Center Virtualization Engineer
description:
Overview

Data Center Virtualization Engineers support the enterprise virtual infrastructure for all sites within the RCC-SWA Area of Responsibility and provide optimization, administration and technical documentation for the enterprise virtual infrastructure. DCSEs resolve enterprise-level change requests and act as the top-level of support escalation for all enterprise virtualization support issues. Principal technical areas include VMware, NetApp, Cisco UCS, Microsoft Servers and related virtualization, storage, networking, and monitoring technologies.

This position offers company-paid housing and transportation, a completion bonus and tuition reimbursement program!

You must satisfy all host country requirements to legally work in the host country in order to be qualified for this position.

Responsibilities

  • Enterprise-level support for VMware virtualization technologies including VMware ESXi, vCenter, vCOPS, vRealize, and SRM. Top-tier support for escalated issues and complex projects. Daily monitoring of all enterprise virtualization for integrity, reliability, resource utilization and availability. Periodic reports on virtual resource capacity and utilization as well as system uptime, performance, and troubleshooting/MTTR. Log review and issue reporting related to monitoring of temperature and overall virtualization health throughout the RCC-SWA AOR.
  • Experienced with configuration and provisioning of VMs, ESXi hosts, and VCSAs. Proficient in the planning, installation, configuration, and upgrades of the virtual network infrastructure. The top-tier of support for virtualization projects and solutions related to backup, disaster recovery, virtual networking, HA, performance monitoring, firmware/software upgrades, and system audit tasks.
  • Documentation for Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs) for configuring and managing the virtual environment including virtual networking, physical hosts, VMs, access control, resource monitoring and management, HA, fault tolerance and scalable virtualization infrastructure.
  • The work environment will be 95% indoors and 5% outdoors.
  • Perform additional duties as assigned.

Qualifications

  • Qualifications:
  • Education / Certifications: One-year related experience can be substituted for one year of education if the degree is required.
    • Bachelorâ€™s Degree or equivalent experience preferably in Computer Science or MIS, IS, Engineering or related field.
    • This position requires candidates to adhere to DoD 8570.01. All candidates are required to maintain at least one (1) baseline certification and one (1) computing environment (CE) certification. Baseline certifications cannot also be used as a Computing Environment (CE) certification. The authorized certifications for this job title are listed as follows:
  • IAT Level: IAT III
  • BASELINE:
    • Cisco: CCNP Security
    • CompTIA: CASP+ ce: Advanced Security Practitioner
    • GIAC: GCED: Certified Enterprise Defender
    • GIAC: GCIH: Certified Incident Handler
    • ISACA: CISA: Certified Information Systems Auditor
    • ISC2: CISSP (or Associate): Certified Information Systems Security Professional
  • COMPUTING ENVIRONMENT (CE):

    • CNFIAS: Cisco and NetApp Flexpod Implementation and Administration Specialist
    • NetApp: NCDA: Certified Data Administrator
    • NetApp: NCDA: Certified Data Administrator, ONTAP
    • NetApp: NCHCA: Certified Hybrid Cloud Administrator
    • NetApp: NCHCA: Certified Hybrid Cloud Architect
    • NetApp: NCIE: Certified Implementation Engineer
    • NetApp: NCIE-DPS: Certified Implementation Engineer - Data Protection Specialist
    • NetApp: NCIE-O-S: Certified Implementation Engineer, ONTAP Specialist
    • NetApp: NCIE-SAN: Certified Implementation Engineer - SAN Specialist, ONTAP

    • NetApp: NCSE: Certified Storage Engineer

  • Experience: One year of related academic study above the high school level may be substituted for one year of experience up to a maximum of a 4-year bachelor's degree in a Software Engineering or Business Information Systems discipline for three years general experience.
    • At least five years of practical experience working with various data (network and system) technologies.
    • Candidate must have a working knowledge of server, storage, and desktop virtualization technologies.
    • Experience with vSphere client, ESXCLI, and PowerCLI is a must.
    • Must have virtualization configuration and administration experience and understands VMware vSphere 6.0 and 6.5 technologies.
    • Experienced with Cisco UCS management, C- series, and B-series servers. Experienced with regular virtualization capacity planning and reporting.

title: IT Organization Microsoft Power BI Developer
description:
Overview

We at Elev8 are looking for a competent and experienced Microsoft Power BI Developer to join our IT team. Your primary responsibility will be to create and implement business intelligence solutions using the Microsoft Power BI platform. You will work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, design and develop data models, create visualizations and reports, and provide insights to help make informed data-driven decisions. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data analysis, visualization, and Power BI development, as well as excellent problem-solving and communication skills. If you are a skilled Power BI Developer passionate about data analysis, visualization, and delivering impactful business intelligence solutions, we encourage you to join our team and help us achieve our goal of using the power of data to drive organizational success.

Equipping workforces with digital skills to succeed in the future.

Elev8 is the leading partner for global skilling and transformative education initiatives for enterprises and governments. The most respected organizations rely on us to help them reach their digital transformation goals. Governments look to us to prepare their citizens for the jobs of the future. If you want to grow in your career and make an impact every day, come join our global team.

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data and reporting needs, translating requirements into effective Power BI solutions.
  • Design and develop data models, transformations, and connections to ensure accurate and efficient data retrieval and analysis.
  • Create visually appealing and interactive dashboards, reports, and visualizations that effectively communicate insights and key metrics to stakeholders.
  • Develop & maintain data pipelines & ETL processes to ensure the timely & accurate ingestion into Power BI.
  • Conduct data analysis, perform data profiling to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies, and provide actionable recommendations based on findings.
  • Optimize performance of Power BI solutions, including data refresh schedules, query optimization, and report rendering.
  • Collaborate with the IT team to ensure data integrity, security, & compliance with organizational policies & standards.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest Power BI features, updates, and best practices, and provide recommendations for enhancements and improvements.
  • Conduct user training sessions and create documentation to effectively empower users to leverage Power BI.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve Power BI reports, data connections, and performance issues.

Qualifications

Experience:

  • Proven experience as a Microsoft Power BI Developer with a strong understanding of data analysis, visualization, and reporting.
  • Power BI certification is preferred.

Skills

  • Proficiency in developing and maintaining Power BI dashboards, reports, and visualizations. In-depth knowledge of Power BI features, including DAX expressions, data modeling, and custom visuals.
  • Experience with data integration and ETL processes, including data extraction, transformation, and loading. Strong SQL skills and the ability to write complex queries to retrieve and manipulate data.
  • Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and best practices. Solid understanding of data visualization principles and best practices.

Abilities

  • Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with stakeholders across different teams. Proactive attitude with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions and meeting project deadlines.
  • Fluency in English and Arabic is essential in both written and spoken form.

title: Software Developer Internship
description:
Welcome to the Pinerium Software Developer Internship Program! We are thrilled to offer a transformative opportunity for aspiring computer science and engineering students to gain hands-on experience and make a lasting impact on our software solutions. This immersive internship will enable you to develop and maintain cutting-edge technologies while working alongside our experienced team.

Responsibilities:

As an intern, you will actively contribute to our software development projects, ensuring the highest quality standards and customer satisfaction. Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Adhering to production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards by following established programming guidelines.
  • Collaborating with the team to identify and implement process improvements, leveraging new technologies to enhance our software solutions.
  • Assisting in project planning by validating project objectives, scoping requirements, and defining specifications.
  • Providing accurate time estimates for software development tasks to ensure efficient project management.
  • Creating comprehensive flowcharts to visualize the movement of data within our software systems.
  • Crafting clear and concise technical documentation to facilitate effective knowledge sharing.
  • Compiling personal activity, project status, and program status reports to keep stakeholders informed.
  • Safeguarding the confidentiality and security of our operations and sensitive information.
  • Collaborating closely with the team, demonstrating your eagerness to tackle development challenges and enhance the overall user experience.

RequirementsTo be considered for this prestigious internship opportunity, we are seeking candidates who possess the following qualifications:

  • Pursuing a Bachelors degree in computer science or a related field.
  • Strong command of front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Proficiency in JQuery and Bootstrap for creating dynamic and responsive web interfaces.
  • Familiarity with back-end technologies such as Node.js or Java to enable robust software development.
  • Knowledge of SQL databases, including MySQL and SQL Server, to manage data effectively.
  • Solid understanding of Restful APIs to facilitate seamless integration with external systems.
  • Familiarity with version control systems, particularly GIT, to ensure effective code collaboration.
  • Experience or exposure to serverless platforms, unlocking the potential for scalable and efficient software solutions.
  • Knowledge of low-code and no-code development, empowering rapid application development.
  • Strong sense of responsibility and ownership, enabling you to thrive in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines.
  • A keen willingness to adapt to emerging technologies, embracing new challenges with enthusiasm.
  • Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to overcome complex software development hurdles.
  • Proficient in English and capable of working collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
  • Immediate availability is preferred, showcasing your dedication and commitment.
  • Positive attitude and self-driven mindset, with a passion for independent learning and personal growth.
  • Familiarity with front-end frameworks like React or Angular is a valuable asset.
  • Experience in building applications using Python is a plus, indicating your versatility.
  • Understanding of containerization technologies, such as Docker, showcases your familiarity with modern development practices.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) methodologies is advantageous.
  • Familiarity with NoSQL databases further enhances your profile.

BenefitsAs an intern at Pinerium, you will enjoy a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your growth and development:

  • An immersive experience in an entrepreneurial and well-structured environment.
  • The opportunity to work alongside a highly professional and dynamic team.
  • Personal and professional growth opportunities, positioning you as a leader of tomorrow.
  • A supportive and creative work environment that encourages you to unleash your full potential.
  • Join our esteemed Software Developer Internship Program at Pinerium and embark on a transformative journey that will pave the way for an exceptional career in software development. Apply now to be a part of our innovative and vibrant team!

We are excited to offer you the opportunity to participate in our Unpaid Internship Program at Pinerium. Please note that this is an unpaid program with a duration of 3 months. While the program may not provide financial compensation, it offers a valuable platform for you to gain practical experience, develop your skills, and explore your career interests.

title: Oracle Developer
description:
Job Title:

Oracle Developer

Job Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Oracle Developer to join our dynamic IT team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Oracle database development and a proven track record of successfully delivering high-quality solutions. The Oracle Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and implementing database solutions that meet our organizational needs.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement Oracle database solutions based on business requirements.

  • Preferred proven work experience as an Oracle Developer or similar role.

title: Learning Engineer Senior
description:
Department: NUQ Info Technology

Salary/Grade: ITS/80

The Learning Engineer Senior will work to enhance the digital learning environment at Northwestern Qatar. The role leads Qatar campus support of the Canvas Learning Management System and other instructional technology software. The role will deliver workshops to faculty and provide curriculum design and course development support services. The Learning Engineer Senior has expertise in the learning sciences and emerging teaching and learning practices; classroom technology tools that support increased classroom engagement; effective content authoring and lesson design methods that best serve online and hybrid education; and successful experience in helping university instructors.

Responsibilities

Serve as the primary point of contact for faculty members and students for Canvas-related inquiries, troubleshooting, and technical support.

Offer one-on-one and group training sessions to ensure faculty are proficient in using Canvas features for course development and management.

Collaborate with faculty members to identify, select, and integrate educational technologies to enhance the student learning experience.

Provide guidance on the effective use of instructional technology and classroom audio/visual features to improve pedagogy and course content.

Develop resources for NU-Q departments to expand their online and instructional presence.

Collaborate with NU-Q academic programs, business units, and relevant committees for longer term strategic initiatives promoting teaching excellence.

Recommend and guide the development of the NU-Q learning technology and instructional support service catalog. When required, manage product and service evaluation projects partnering with faculty and relevant IT teams to pilot and launch services.

Promote creative and trusting partnerships for educational innovation with NU-Q administrators and instructors.

Research industry practices in blended learning and support faculty in incorporating evidence-based practices in their teaching practice.

Maintain currency in current learning sciences and instructional design principles for effective support of online and blended education, peer learning and active learning practices.

Represent NU-Q in instructional support peer groups in Education City and Northwestern.

Other duties may be assigned.

Required Knowledge, Skills, And Abilities

A bachelorâ€™s degree in a relevant discipline, such as Education, Communications, Computer Science, or Instructional Design.

Proven, demonstrable experience of three years or more in supporting faculty with integrating technology into their teaching practice.

Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with faculty and students.

Experience in technology-focused professional development and training.

Demonstratable experience in the application of generative AI technologies such as ChatGPT or similar.

Passion for advancing the use of educational technology in higher education.

The target budgeted minimum starting salary for this position is $86,533 - $90,860. Offers will be based on candidate experience and education, as well as equity within Northwestern University.

Northwestern strongly recommends COVID-19 vaccinations and boosters for people who can obtain them as a critical tool for minimizing severe illness. More information can be found on the COVID-19 and Campus Updates webpage.

The Northwestern campus sits on the traditional homelands of the people of the Council of Three Fires, the Ojibwe, Potawatomi, and Odawa as well as the Menominee, Miami and Ho-Chunk nations. We acknowledge and honor the original people of the land upon which Northwestern University stands, and the Native people who remain on this land today.

title: WAN Engineer
description:
Overview

The WAN Engineer performs operation and maintenance (O&M) for the RCC-SWA enterprise network infrastructure. WAN Engineers will ensure stability and provide daily support of the Global Network Infrastructure, responding to network issues, and offering expert guidance to site level personnel. Must have a strong understanding of Cisco routers, switches, and VPN devices. Core duties include moves, adds, changes, installs, migrations, and decommissions to core network devices in accordance with change management policy and procedures.

This position offers company-paid housing and transportation, a completion bonus and tuition reimbursement program!

You must satisfy all host country requirements to legally work in the host country in order to be qualified for this position.

Responsibilities

  • Responsible for maintaining and operating routers and switches throughout the South West Asia Area of Responsibility.
  • Configures:
    • Open Short Path First (OSPF)
    • Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol (EIGRP)
    • Border Gateway Protocol (BGP)
    • Multi-Protocol BGP (MP-BGP)
    • Dynamic Multipoint Virtual Private Networking (DMVPN)
    • Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS)
    • Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF)
    • Quality of Service (QoS).
  • Evaluates network performance and makes adjustments to the network infrastructure hardware and software to include, but not limited to, routers, switches, and network management tools, in order to operate and optimize network performance.
  • Perform capacity planning for communications networks carrying data, voice, and video.
  • The engineer will create and track network issues/requests using the ITSM / Remedy v8.1 ticketing system.
  • Ability to troubleshoot servers and infrastructure equipment.
  • Ability to assess networking requirements and provide solutions.
  • Ability to make accurate and independent decisions under pressure.
  • Experience with a customer service oriented company.
  • Excellent organizational, interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to perform comfortably in a fast-paced, deadline-oriented work environment.
  • Ability to successfully execute many complex tasks simultaneously.
  • The work environment will be 95% indoor and 5% outdoor.
  • Perform additional duties as assigned.

Qualifications

  • This position requires candidates to adhere to DoDD 8140.01. All candidates are required to maintain at least one (1) baseline certification and one (1) computing environment (CE) certification. Baseline certifications cannot also be used as a Computing Environment (CE) certification. The authorized certifications for this job title are listed as follows:
  • IAT Level: IAT III
  • BASELINE:
    • Cisco: CCNP: Certified Network Professional - Security (Cannot be used as a dual qualifier)
    • CompTIA: CASP+ ce: Advanced Security Practitioner
    • GIAC: GCED: Certified Enterprise Defender
    • GIAC: GCIH: Certified Incident Handler
    • ISACA: CISA: Certified Information Systems Auditor
    • ISC2: CISSP (or Associate): Certified Information Systems Security Professional
  • COMPUTING ENVIRONMENT (CE):
    • Cisco: CC-DN-P: Certified DevNet Professional
    • Cisco: CCIE - Certified Internetwork Expert (Any)
    • Cisco: CCNP: Certified Network Professional: Certified Network Professional (Any)
We are committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace that values and supports the contributions of each individual. This commitment along with our common Vision and Values of Integrity, Respect, and Responsibility, allows us to leverage differences, encourage innovation and expand our success in the global marketplace. Vectrus is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, protected veteran status or status as an individual with a disability. EOE/Minority/Female/Disabled/Veteran.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Greetings !!!!

 

Myself Kishore Sai from HyperThink Systems, India and we have an immediate requirement for Senior Data Engineer located at Doha, Qatar with one of our leading banking based domain client.


Please find job details and let me know if you are interested for below position,

Job Role: â€œSenior Data Engineerâ€

Job Type: Contract (Working on HyperThink Systems â€“ Qatar Rolls and deployed at client place)

Location: Doha, Qatar

Duration: Initial 1 Year and Extendable

Years of Experience: 10.0 + Years

Job Description:                  

As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for building, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines, data warehouses, and data lakes that support the bank's business operations. You will use your expertise in SQL, SAP, and Power BI tools to ensure that the data is accurate, complete, and easily accessible to users across the organization. You will work closely with data scientists, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure that the data architecture and infrastructure meet the bank's requirements.

Key Roles & Responsibilities:

Functional Role:

  • Responsible for the technical design and implementation of lifecycle activities associated with the extract, transform, and loading (ETL) of database tables using automated utilities and ETL tools such as SAP BODS.
  • Develop and implement data integration and ETL processes to ensure accurate, complete, and easily accessible data for users.
  • Perform root cause analysis on all processes, resolve production issues, validate data, and conduct routine tests on databases while providing support to all ETL applications.
  • Develop and conduct tests on all ETL codes for system data, analyze all data, and design data mapping techniques for all data models in systems.
  • Support ETL schedule and maintain compliance while developing and maintaining various standards to perform ETL codes and an effective project life cycle on all ETL processes.
  • Analyze and interpret complex data on target systems, provide resolutions to data issues, coordinate with data analysts to validate all requirements, and conduct interviews with users and developers.
  • Create and modify PL/SQL and SQL Loader scripts, triggers, packages, functions, and stored procedures for data conversions and PL/SQL procedures to create database objects dynamically based on user inputs.
  • Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualizations using Power BI to help stakeholders across the organization gain insights from the data.
  • Work closely with data scientists, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure that the data architecture and infrastructure meet the bank's requirements.
  • Ensure the performance, reliability, and scalability of the data infrastructure, including monitoring and optimization of queries, indexing, and caching.
  • Develop and maintain documentation of data pipelines, data models, and data dictionaries.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in data engineering and proactively propose new
  • solutions to improve the bank's data infrastructure.

Technical Skills:

Advanced:

  • Oracle
  • SAP BODS
  • PL/SQL
  • SAP Business Objects (Web Intelligence)

Intermediate:

  • Power BI
  • JSON/API
  • Azure

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
  • At least 8 years of experience in a data engineering role - ETL developer-, preferably in a banking or financial services environment.
  • 3+ years of experience in banking / financial services industry.
  • 5+ years of experience in SAP BODS, PL/SQL.
  • Strong programming skills in Python, Java, and SQL.
  • Experience with data modelling, database design, and SQL optimization.
  • Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot issues and optimize data systems.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team.
  • Experience with big data technologies, such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka are plus
  • Experience with cloud-based data infrastructure, such as AWS or Azure are plus


About HyperThink Systems Pvt Ltd: HyperThink Systems Pvt Ltd is a leading IT and business services company with a diverse services portfolio and a focus to provide integrated services in Technology and Operations. HyperThink Systems Pvt Ltd is an Established Qatari Company having its offshore set-up (ODC) in Hyderabad.

Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on.

Working with Consensys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and weâ€™re far from reaching our full potential. Youâ€™ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

Youâ€™ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects â€” challenging you to stay at the top of your game. Youâ€™ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. Consensys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About MetaMask

Weâ€™re building for a future where the internet and world economy empowers people through interactions based on consent, privacy, and free association. Where both communities and individuals flourish. To accomplish that, weâ€™re working hard to make web3 accessible for everyone around the world.

MetaMask is both a crypto wallet and a gateway to the decentralized web. Our tools help people create communities, play video games, access financial services, make payments, invest in assets, protect against economic turmoil, and more. Our browser extension and mobile platforms meet the needs of millions of users and developers across the world.

Originally a humble key manager, today MetaMask serves over 30 million monthly active users as a decentralized application development platform, an aggregator of decentralized cryptocurrency exchanges, and a decentralized identity manager.

title: Senior Backend Developer (C#/.NET Core)
description:
Job description

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain backend solutions using C# and .NET Core frameworks.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements, and translate them into technical specifications and design documents.

Architect and implement scalable and efficient backend systems, ensuring high performance, security, and reliability.

Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code, following best practices and coding standards.

Develop and maintain APIs and web services to enable seamless integration with frontend and third-party systems.

Implement and maintain data storage and retrieval solutions, such as databases, caching mechanisms, and message queues.

Collaborate with frontend developers to ensure smooth integration between the frontend and backend components.

Implement and maintain unit tests and automated test suites to ensure the quality and stability of the backend codebase.

Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks, scalability issues, and other technical challenges.

Participate in code reviews to provide constructive feedback and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.

Stay up to date with industry trends and advancements in backend development, C#, and .NET Core technologies.

Mentor and provide guidance to junior developers, fostering their technical growth and professional development.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus.

Proven experience (5+ years) working as a Backend Developer, with a strong focus on C# and .NET Core development.

In-depth knowledge of C# programming language and .NET Core framework.

Experience in designing and developing RESTful APIs and web services.

Proficiency in working with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, MySQL) and familiarity with ORM frameworks (e.g., Entity Framework).

Strong understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices.

Experience with cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS, and knowledge of related services (e.g., Azure Functions, AWS Lambda).

Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to debug and troubleshoot complex issues.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.

Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus.

Relevant certifications, such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate or MCSD: App Builder, are highly desirable.

title: Software Upgrade Specialist
description:
Description

The Elekta Care Support Centre provides clinical and technical support for Oncology products specifically in Europe and also in distributor territories.

Software Upgrade Specialists are responsible for all aspects of test and clinical software upgrades, these include performing the upgrade, supporting the go-live process and being involved during the planning phase.

In order to maintain the necessary field competence significant travel (up to 30%) will be expected throughout the region. Upgrades mostly occur at unsociable hours and weekends so as to limit the impact on patientsâ€™ clinical treatments.

The individual is expected to be first and foremost a good communicator with excellent interpersonal skills and dedication to our customers. Significant in-depth technical knowledge of the product from the hardware on which it runs through to the use of the applications software is essential and it is expected that the individual will be self-motivated enough to maintain and update this knowledge.

This role will initially be Monday to Friday during the training period and then will include Friday night and weekend work.

Responsibilities

General

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ability to effectively interact with customers.
  • Ability to Travel 30%.
  • Ability to work in a team environment.
  • Flexible and accommodating approach.
  • Ability and desire to promote Elektaâ€™s professional image.

Core Competencies

  • Can demonstrate strong customer care skills.
  • Experience in a support environment desirable.
  • Knowledge of Health Care desirable
  • Fluent in at least 1 other European language (French, German, Italian, Spanish).
  • Follow Elektaâ€™s quality and regulatory and safety policies at all times. Supporting and promoting Elektaâ€™s image no matter what the circumstances.
  • Behaving in a professional manner at all times.

Role Specific

  • Ensuring that the customer is fully aware of the implications of any upgrade work being undertaken before that work commences. Provide and maintain all documentation required to support a software upgrade.
  • Being available as required to take calls from customers, Elekta engineers and Distributors pertaining an upgrade.
  • Escalate to management any technical issues that are likely to become significant, including potential issues preventing new software rollouts.
  • Ensure that at all times, Business Units and distributors are kept updated with progress of any issues being dealt with.
  • Prioritizing and managing cases in an efficient and professional manner.
  • Performing regular installation work and upgrades at customers sites and remotely as required.
  • Documenting and having work accepted by the customer before leaving site or closing the case.
  • Being available to travel at short notice to resolve technical and political issues at customers sites.

Relevant Knowledge, Skills And Competencies

  • Strong technical skills in the area of PC/Network Computing.
  • Strong knowledge of SQL, Citrix, Cloud, MS servers, Virtualisation, Windows Operating Systems.
  • Educated to Degree or diploma in Computer Sciences (or equivalent work experience).

title: Senior Database Administrator
description:
A leader in cutting-edge research and technology in the cyber arena, CPMG focuses on using business drivers to guide cybersecurity activities and manage risk. CPMG offers flexible, integrative solutions for Department of Defense (DoD) contractors, among others, and specializes in cybersecurity, information and operational technology, electronic security surveillance, and support services.

Summary:

We are looking for a Senior Database Administrator (DBA). The DBA will work with other system managers as needed to resolve inter-system issues. Provide end user support, including account management and data access. Implement system upgrades and patches.

Responsibilities

Essential Job Functions:

  • Disaster recovery, performance analysis and tuning, index maintenance, and monitoring of data.
  • Administer, maintain, develop, and implement policies and procedures for ensuring the security and integrity of the database.
  • Evaluate and recommend available database management system (DBMS) products.
  • Perform database and software life-cycle activities to ensure the highest level of system performance and availability and compliance with business requirements.
  • Develop, test, and implement backup and recovery strategies consistent with organization policies.
  • Provide developer support in various programming languages in use by the SSM.
  • Recommend and implement quality improvement efforts.
  • Manage daily tasks and priorities, participate in scheduled team meetings, and assist with assessment of requirements for software and database development and maintenance.
  • Plans and leads major technology assignments.
  • Evaluates performance results and recommends major changes affecting short-term project growth and success.
  • Functions as a technical expert across multiple project assignments
  • May supervise others.

#CJ

Qualifications

Necessary Skills and Knowledge:

  • The administrator should have a deep understanding of database administration and cloud computing, including experience with database management systems (DBMS) and cloud databases such as Amazon RDS and Azure Database.
  • Have extensive background in all aspects of enterprise technology.
  • Database Design and Architecture: have experience in database design and architecture, including the ability to design, implement and maintain cloud databases.
  • Database Performance: experience in database performance optimization and be able to identify and resolve performance issues in cloud databases.
  • Cloud Migration: experience in migrating databases to the cloud and be able to support the migration process, including data migration, data integration, and database maintenance.
  • Database Security: a deep understanding of database security and be able to implement and maintain secure database configurations in cloud environments.
  • Collaboration: The administrator should be able to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with other administrators, engineers, and stakeholders.
  • Communication: have strong communication skills and be able to effectively communicate technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Problem Solving: the ability to analyze complex problems and develop innovative solutions to meet the needs of the organization in cloud environments.
  • In addition to these skills, the administrator should also have experience with IT service management practices and a deep understanding of cloud computing architecture and best practices.
  • Excellent documentation skills, including the ability to maintain up-to-date technical documentation and procedures.

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in a STEM field
  • 5-10 Years of related experience
  • Several years of experience in the field and have a broad understanding of different aspects of IT, including hardware, software, networking, and security.
  • Certifications : Relevant certifications, such as Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH), or Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), may be required or preferred.
  • MUST have an ACTIVE Top-Secret Clearance with SCI eligibility .

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Familiarity with government and industry security standards, such as NIST and FedRAMP, is also desirable for a journeyman cloud database administrator working in the Department of Defense.

The salary range for this position is $115,000.00-$144,000.00 annually.

Pay And Benefits

At Goldbelt, we value and reward our team's dedication and hard work. We provide a competitive base salary commensurate with your qualifications and experience. As an employee, you'll enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) plan with company matching, tax-deferred savings options, supplementary benefits, paid time off, and professional development opportunities.

They will also be responsible for collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify business requirements, design specifications, and provide customized solutions.

title: C++ developer (m/f/d) in Berlin and REMOTE. 130 000 euro per year
description:
• A wide array of extremely challenging C++ development tasks
  • An international team of brilliant minds
  • A competitive salary from the start and a raise to EUR 130,000 annually after only one year
  • A working environment that makes this team stay and grow
  • Enough time to make sure that every detail of your solution is perfect
  • A flat organization and plenty of room for your ideas
  • No scheduled meetings
  • Family-friendly working hours, no deadlines, no overtime
  • Support for relocation to Berlin or remote work opportunity!


About this job

We are looking for smart, creative developers with a solid theoretical background. You should be able to look at a problem from the user's perspective, discuss abstract concepts with fellow developers, as well as produce an elegant implementation. Developers we have hired in the past mostly hold an exceptional master's degree in computer science or even a doctorate.


At think-cell, we like flat hierarchies. You will work largely independently and will be responsible for the whole range of activities when implementing a new feature. We expect each of our developers to do architecture, design, implementation and bug fixing, rather than splitting these activities between several people. We thus minimize communication losses and put everyone in control of their own work. Your ideas are welcome, even if they mean that we have to change a lot of code to make things better.


We have published several scientific articles in the areas of Artificial Intelligence and Computer Graphics and we will encourage you to do the same. We sponsor visits to conferences and have close connections to universities and research institutes in the U.S. and Germany.


think-cell encourages a healthy work-life balance. We do not work at night or on weekends, and support our staff's families with a full-time company nanny. She is available for free when children are sick, or if you just feel like spending an evening out.


We pay very competitive salaries, and offer our developers EUR 130,000 annually following one year of employment. If necessary, we will go out of our way to help you relocate to Berlin, and will do what we can to help you acquire a work permit.


Remote work is now also possible!


About our software

Since 2002, think-cell produces graphics software that performs most of the painstaking work of creating data-driven slides for professional Excel and PowerPoint users. PowerPoint slide creation is one of the most popular things professionals use a computer for. Thus, it is rather surprising that while intelligent software has revolutionized many things we frequently do, such as web search in our browser, or telephone speech recognition in a call center, office productivity software has not changed much over the past decade or so.


think-cell is out to change this. We stand out from the crowd of other presentation software because we are willing to do the leg work of developing sophisticated algorithms and refining our user interface, which makes working with our software so satisfying for our users. Here are some highlights of what we have done.


Algorithmic highlights

  • We developed a new algorithm for automatic point cloud labeling that allows labels to be positioned away from the actual points.
  • We developed a new algorithm for automatic column chart labeling.
  • We are working with John Forrest â€“ author of the linear solver CLP â€“ to make his simplex code faster on our kind of problems.
  • We developed quite a few generic data structures that are not in C++ or Boost, for example partitions.


Hacking highlights

  • To do things that are not possible via the documented Microsoft Office API, we do lots of reverse engineering with the disassembler IDA from Hex-Rays.
  • We wrote probably the best function hooking engine out there. On each start of our software, we patch the Microsoft Office executables in memory. We search for small chunks of assembly code rather than hard-coding patch addresses to be robust against minor code modifications.
  • We redirect PowerPoint's and Excel's window contents into offscreen buffers and use Direct3D 9.0 to render our user interface on top.


Other highlights

  • We fund the working group for programming languages of the German Institute for Standardization (DIN). Some of our employees are members of this committee and vote in the international standardization process of ISO/IEC C++.
  • We closely track the latest versions of our compilers, Visual C++ and Xcode, so we can always use the latest C++ standard features as soon as they become available.
  • We use Boost throughout our code, e.g., Boost.Spirit for most of our parsing needs.
  • We have our own range library, in the same spirit as Boost.Range or Eric Nieblerâ€™s range-v3, but going further, for example, by unifying internal and external iteration. We gave a talk about it, and most of the code is public.
  • We have our own reference-counting and persistence libraries to save and restore whole object trees.
  • We wrote a parser and writer for the Excel .xls format.
  • We have an extensive bug reporting infrastructure. Assertions and error checks stay in the release code, and our software automatically reports bugs to our server. The server analyzes the bug, categorizes it and files it in a database that all developers can access. If an update fixes the bug, the user can download the update directly from a bug response web page.


Interested?

If you are the one missing from our team then please send us your electronic application via hr@think-cell.com


We will only accept applications that contain a CV.

If an update fixes the bug, the user can download the update directly from a bug response web page.


Interested?

title: Shopify Developer Plus
description:
Job Title: Shopify Developer Plus

Location: Kuwait 


Company Overview: 

The company is a leading eCommerce agency specializing in creating cutting-edge online stores and innovative solutions for businesses worldwide. We are dedicated to delivering the best user experience and driving success for our clients through our expertise in the eCommerce ecosystem. We are currently seeking a highly skilled and motivated Shopify Developer to join our growing team.


Position Overview:

As a Shopify Developer at our company, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Shopify websites and apps for our clients. You will work closely with our sales and customer care teams to ensure the solutions we create are highly functional, user-friendly, and aligned with the unique requirements of our clients.


Key Responsibilities:

1. Design and develop custom Shopify websites and apps using best practices in Shopify development.

2. Collaborate with sales team to understand client requirements and create solutions that meet their needs.

3. Work closely with the customer care team to resolve client-facing issues and provide technical support.

4. Ensure seamless integration of apps and websites with client systems.

5. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in Shopify development to continually improve our processes and deliverables.

6. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the websites and apps, ensuring minimal impact on the client's business operations.

7. Provide documentation and training for clients and internal team members on website and app features and usage.

title: C++ developer (m/f/d) in Berlin and REMOTE. 130 000 euro per year
description:
• A wide array of extremely challenging C++ development tasks
  • An international team of brilliant minds
  • A competitive salary from the start and a raise to EUR 130,000 annually after only one year
  • A working environment that makes this team stay and grow
  • Enough time to make sure that every detail of your solution is perfect
  • A flat organization and plenty of room for your ideas
  • No scheduled meetings
  • Family-friendly working hours, no deadlines, no overtime
  • Support for relocation to Berlin or remote work opportunity!


About this job

We are looking for smart, creative developers with a solid theoretical background. You should be able to look at a problem from the user's perspective, discuss abstract concepts with fellow developers, as well as produce an elegant implementation. Developers we have hired in the past mostly hold an exceptional master's degree in computer science or even a doctorate.


At think-cell, we like flat hierarchies. You will work largely independently and will be responsible for the whole range of activities when implementing a new feature. We expect each of our developers to do architecture, design, implementation and bug fixing, rather than splitting these activities between several people. We thus minimize communication losses and put everyone in control of their own work. Your ideas are welcome, even if they mean that we have to change a lot of code to make things better.


We have published several scientific articles in the areas of Artificial Intelligence and Computer Graphics and we will encourage you to do the same. We sponsor visits to conferences and have close connections to universities and research institutes in the U.S. and Germany.


think-cell encourages a healthy work-life balance. We do not work at night or on weekends, and support our staff's families with a full-time company nanny. She is available for free when children are sick, or if you just feel like spending an evening out.


We pay very competitive salaries, and offer our developers EUR 130,000 annually following one year of employment. If necessary, we will go out of our way to help you relocate to Berlin, and will do what we can to help you acquire a work permit.


Remote work is now also possible!


About our software

Since 2002, think-cell produces graphics software that performs most of the painstaking work of creating data-driven slides for professional Excel and PowerPoint users. PowerPoint slide creation is one of the most popular things professionals use a computer for. Thus, it is rather surprising that while intelligent software has revolutionized many things we frequently do, such as web search in our browser, or telephone speech recognition in a call center, office productivity software has not changed much over the past decade or so.


think-cell is out to change this. We stand out from the crowd of other presentation software because we are willing to do the leg work of developing sophisticated algorithms and refining our user interface, which makes working with our software so satisfying for our users. Here are some highlights of what we have done.


Algorithmic highlights

  • We developed a new algorithm for automatic point cloud labeling that allows labels to be positioned away from the actual points.
  • We developed a new algorithm for automatic column chart labeling.
  • We are working with John Forrest â€“ author of the linear solver CLP â€“ to make his simplex code faster on our kind of problems.
  • We developed quite a few generic data structures that are not in C++ or Boost, for example partitions.


Hacking highlights

  • To do things that are not possible via the documented Microsoft Office API, we do lots of reverse engineering with the disassembler IDA from Hex-Rays.
  • We wrote probably the best function hooking engine out there. On each start of our software, we patch the Microsoft Office executables in memory. We search for small chunks of assembly code rather than hard-coding patch addresses to be robust against minor code modifications.
  • We redirect PowerPoint's and Excel's window contents into offscreen buffers and use Direct3D 9.0 to render our user interface on top.


Other highlights

  • We fund the working group for programming languages of the German Institute for Standardization (DIN). Some of our employees are members of this committee and vote in the international standardization process of ISO/IEC C++.
  • We closely track the latest versions of our compilers, Visual C++ and Xcode, so we can always use the latest C++ standard features as soon as they become available.
  • We use Boost throughout our code, e.g., Boost.Spirit for most of our parsing needs.
  • We have our own range library, in the same spirit as Boost.Range or Eric Nieblerâ€™s range-v3, but going further, for example, by unifying internal and external iteration. We gave a talk about it, and most of the code is public.
  • We have our own reference-counting and persistence libraries to save and restore whole object trees.
  • We wrote a parser and writer for the Excel .xls format.
  • We have an extensive bug reporting infrastructure. Assertions and error checks stay in the release code, and our software automatically reports bugs to our server. The server analyzes the bug, categorizes it and files it in a database that all developers can access. If an update fixes the bug, the user can download the update directly from a bug response web page.


Interested?

If you are the one missing from our team then please send us your electronic application via hr@think-cell.com


We will only accept applications that contain a CV.

title: Oracle APEX Developer
description:
Oracle APEX Developer

Position Overview:

As an Oracle APEX Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using Oracle Application Express (APEX). You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, project managers, and database administrators, to gather requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. Your expertise in Oracle APEX will be vital in creating robust, scalable, and user-friendly applications that meet the organization's needs.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Application Development: Design and develop web applications using Oracle APEX, adhering to best practices and coding standards. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements, analyze business needs, and translate them into technical solutions.
  2. Database Development: Create and optimize database objects such as tables, views, stored procedures, and triggers within the Oracle Database. Ensure data integrity, performance, and security.
  3. User Interface Design: Develop intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces using Oracle APEX features such as themes, templates, and page layouts. Customize the application's look and feel to align with the organization's branding guidelines.
  4. Integration: Integrate Oracle APEX applications with other enterprise systems and third-party tools, ensuring seamless data flow and interoperability.
  5. Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing of applications to identify and resolve defects, ensuring high quality and reliability. Use debugging tools and techniques to diagnose and fix issues in a timely manner.
  6. Performance Optimization: Identify and implement performance optimization techniques to enhance the speed and efficiency of Oracle APEX applications. Monitor and fine-tune application performance, database queries, and page load times.
  7. Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, user guides, and operational procedures. Ensure documentation is up to date and accessible to stakeholders.
  8. Collaboration and Support: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, project managers, and database administrators, to understand requirements and provide technical expertise. Provide support and troubleshooting assistance to end-users during application deployment and post-production phases.

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as an Oracle APEX Developer or a similar role, with a strong understanding of Oracle APEX architecture and development concepts.
  • Proficiency in SQL and PL/SQL programming languages.
  • Knowledge of web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
  • Experience with Oracle Database and understanding of database design principles.
  • Familiarity with version control systems and code management tools.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Oracle APEX certifications (e.g., Oracle Application Express Developer Certified Expert).
  • Experience with Oracle RESTful Web Services (ORDS) and Web Source Modules.
  • Knowledge of Oracle Database performance tuning techniques.
  • Understanding of software development methodologies, such as Agile or Scrum.

title: Senior backend Developer
description:
About the company:

We are a rapidly growing company in the health and fitness sector, renowned for our innovative approach and customer-centric services. We are on the lookout for a seasoned Senior Backend Developer to join our dynamic team and play a pivotal role in taking our services to the next level.

 

About the Role:

As our Backend Developer, you'll be at the heart of our technical operations. Harnessing the power of GraphQL and Node.js, you'll architect robust backend services that serve as the foundation of our dynamic platform. Your expertise will be pivotal in managing and optimizing our PostgreSQL database, ensuring data accuracy and swift retrievals. But it's not just about code. You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, translating their needs into API schemas that drive seamless interactions on WILMA. Familiarity with version control software will be key, as you'll be instrumental in ensuring the integrity and evolution of our codebase. And as we operate within an agile framework, your ability to adapt, iterate, and innovate will be crucial. Here, every line of code isn't just functionalityâ€”it's a step closer to enhancing our users' wellness journeys.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of backend functionalities.
  • Oversee server setup, API development, and database integration, ensuring optimal performance and security.
  • Contribute to the strategic direction of the project, bringing innovative ideas to the table.
  • Design, develop, and maintain backend services using Node.js and GraphQL.
  • Collaborate with our frontend team to define and implement API schemas.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of our backend services.
  • Work on our PostgreSQL database, ensuring data integrity and efficiency.
  • Utilize version control software to manage codebase and collaborate with the team.
  • Participate in our agile development process, from sprint planning to retrospectives.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in backend development, preferably in the health and fitness domain.
  • Proven leadership experience, with a track record of leading successful development teams.

 

Skills:

  • Proficiency in backend programming using Node.js.
  • Expertise in database management systems using PostgreSQL
  • Strong understanding of API development and integration with GraphQL.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and leadership skills.

 

  • Interested candidates please send your CV to: m.elia@samsamouy.com

title: Back End Developer
description:
Company Description

Creatify Network is a web and mobile application development company based in Egypt. Since 2012, we have been providing our services in website and application design and programming, graphic design, cybersecurity, 3D printing, and industrial design. Our clients include ESET, Guru.com, Freelap, and Cellanis, among others, and we have provided our services to over 200 clients in more than 49 countries.


Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role as a (mid-level) Back End Developer. The Back End Developer will be responsible for the server-side web application logic, writing and testing code for back-end web development, software development, object-oriented programming (OOP), and apply the suitable design patterns. The role also involves collaborating with Front End Developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including frontend developers, product managers, and designers to deliver high-quality backend solutions that meet business requirements.
  • Participate in the design, development, and maintenance of scalable, robust, and secure backend systems and APIs.
  • Develop and implement coding best practices, guidelines, and standards to ensure code quality, maintainability, and performance.
  • Read and analyze Software Requirements Specification (SRS) documents, and translate them into technical requirements and solutions.
  • Utilize your expertise in PHP and its frameworks, particularly Laravel, to architect and develop efficient and maintainable backend solutions.
  • Identify opportunities for process improvement, innovation, and automation within the team and drive their implementation.
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members, ensuring code quality and adherence to coding standards.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and best practices, and proactively share knowledge and insights with the team.


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • 3 to 5 years of experience as a Backend Developer, with a focus on PHP and its frameworks.
  • Expertise in PHP native development and frameworks, especially Laravel.
  • Strong proficiency in backend programming languages such as PHP, PYTHON.
  • Solid understanding of database technologies (SQL and NoSQL) and proficiency in writing efficient database queries.
  • Experience in managing and mentoring junior developers, providing technical leadership, and fostering a collaborative team environment.
  • Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working in Agile development teams.
  • Ability to read and analyze Software Requirements Specification (SRS) documents and translate them into technical requirements and solutions.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to propose innovative solutions to complex technical challenges.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strong commitment to code quality, best practices, and continuous improvement.
  • Knowledge of AWS solutions will be perfect.


Relevant skills and qualifications that would be beneficial include experience with serverless computing, knowledge of DevOps tools and processes, and experience with cloud technologies such as AWS or Google Cloud Platform.

title: Backend Software Engineer (Python)
description:
Description

b_labs is the transformation and digitization arm of B.TECH, on a mission to change the industry as we know it. We spearhead tech innovation at B.TECH, an organization that has been a cornerstone of the Egyptian retail industry. We are the engine powering B.TECH in achieving its goal of becoming the leading omni-channel platform for consumer electronics and appliances in Egypt. By joining b labs, you will get to benefit from a collaborative startup environment, while also enjoying the stability of working within a company that has achieved strong growth year after year. You will be part of a visionary, customer-focused team with an ambitious mission--to become a trailblazer for digital retail within the Middle East.

Responsibilities

  • Responsible for the system build and functionality.
  • Integrate the application with all required systems and services and provide clean and easy to use APIs and data streams for the frontend part of the system.
  • Full responsibility for the application functionality, performance and scalability.
  • You know how to write clean modern APIs, integrate with legacy systems and work with databases.
  • As an integrative member of the b_labs team, you are actively contributing to the creation of a safe, collaborative, growth-focused, purposeful, values-driven, and diverse company culture across all organizational levels.

Requirements

  • You have 3+ years of professional experience as a software engineer and have expertise particularly in Python.
  • You have deep knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and software development principles.
  • You have significant experience writing and utilizing autonomous service-oriented RESTful API services and tuning largescale apps Excellent knowledge of relational/non-relational DB, including SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB, Couchbase, SQL/PostgreSQL and Redis etc.) .
  • You have experience with building microservice architecture.
  • You have the ability to write effective unit, integration, and API tests.
  • Potentially have knowledge of immutable infrastructure, infrastructure automation & provisioning tools.
  • Experience on cloud technologies (Azure, AWS) and scripting (Bash, Shell), Docker, Kubernetes is a big plus
  • You have experience with loan management systems and core banking systems a big plus.

Benefits Office environment: When you come to our b_labs office, you'll find creative workspaces, a well-equipped kitchen, and an open design to foster collaboration between teams.

Education budget: We believe the learning journey never ends, therefore you will be entitled to an annual education budget to take part in trainings, courses or onsite conferences of your choice.

Flexibility: You know best whether you want to work from home or in the office. However, if you want to join your teammates onsite, we will subsidize the costs for lunch to foster the b_labs office community

Mobility package: When you are joining the b_labs office, we will subsidize your mobility expenses for public transport.

Equipment: From "Day 1" you will receive all the equipment you need be successful at work. Therefore, you can choose your laptop and get all the tools you need to stay on top of your game.

description:

What is FlapKap?

We are the financial growth partner for the digitally-native businesses in the Middle East and Africa. We also give them insights on their media spend to maximize their revenues and profits.

FlapKap is fast, smart, collaborative and first a kind startup that aims to disrupt the financial industry in MEA FlapKap is backed by QED, A15, Outliers, and Nclude with a total financing of $3.6m USD. title: Software Engineer (Backend)
description:
Description

About Us:

Reliance Health is a leading healthcare provider committed to delivering accessible and innovative healthcare solutions to our customers. We are seeking a talented and creative Backend Engineer to join our dynamic team and contribute to enhancing the customer experience through the optimization of self-service and bot automation.

Position Overview:

As a Software Engineer at Reliance Health, you will play a pivotal role in developing, maintaining and optimizing the software used by our customers, our staff and our healthcare partners. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and stakeholders, to identify opportunities for automation and to streamline our user experiences and processes. Through your expertise in software engineering, you will contribute to the evolution of the Reliance Health platform, creating delightful and efficient interactions that empower our customers whilst maintaining rigorous standards of quality and security.

Responsibilities:

  • Backend Development: Design, develop, test, and maintain backend services and APIs using one of the following technologies: PHP (Laravel), Node.js, or Java (Spring Boot). Experience in full-stack development is an advantage.
  • Database Management: Work with various database systems (primarily MySQL and PostgreSQL) to optimize data storage and retrieval.
  • API Integration: Collaborate with frontend and mobile app developers to ensure seamless integration with frontend systems and third-party APIs.
  • Performance Optimization: Identify and address performance bottlenecks and optimize code for appropriate scalability and efficiency.
  • Security: Implement security best practices to protect data and systems from potential threats and vulnerabilities.
  • Code Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code, and participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.
  • Testing: Develop and maintain unit tests, integration tests, and automated testing processes to ensure software reliability.
  • Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and other engineers to understand requirements and deliver solutions that align with business goals.
  • Agile Development: Contribute to an agile development environment, participate in sprint planning, and help drive the development process.
  • Learning and Growth: Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously improve your skills and contribute to the team's technical excellence.

Requirements

  • Proven experience in one or more of the following technologies: PHP (Laravel), Node.js, or Java (Spring Boot).
  • Strong understanding of software engineering principles and design patterns.
  • Experience with database systems, API development, and cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Proficiency in version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development tools.
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
  • Agile development experience is a plus.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Premium health insurance package
  • Opportunity to make a significant impact on improving customer experiences.
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
  • Professional development and growth opportunities.

Application Process:

If you are a passionate Software Engineer with experience in PHP, Node.js, or Java (Spring Boot) and are eager to contribute to our exciting projects, we encourage you to apply. Join us in shaping the future of Reliance Health and making a meaningful impact in the world of healthcare

  • At Reliance Health, we are dedicated to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

Procore Technologies is building the software that builds the world. We do not tolerate discrimination against employees on the basis of age, color, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, marital status, national origin, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other classification protected by law.

title: OFSAA Developer
description:
The OFSAA developer will be part of a development team implementing profitability solution using OFSAA

Key responsibilities:

- Configuration of rules for cost and revenue allocation in OFSAA for profitability calculation. Configure FTP rules in OFSAA. Write T2Ts to transform data. Develop procedure using PL/SQL. Understand business requirements and implement technical solution within OFSAA in an efficient way. Test OFSAA configurations and fix defects as appropriate.

- Troubleshoot technical issues by analyzing OFSAA log files and fixing the issues.

- Understand complex SQL queries, analyze data related issues and identify root cause of issues / defects. Develop and implement performance optimal system.

- Maintain the end-to-end OFSAA batch and provide technical support.

Major responsibilities include:

- Production support of OFSAA, this includes batch runs and minor development requests to fix defects as required.

- Troubleshoot technical issues by analyzing OFSAA log files and fixing the issues. Analyze data related issues and identify root cause of issues / defects.

- Develop rules for cost and revenue allocations in OFSAA including configuring FTP rules and writing T2Ts to transform data. Develop adhoc procedures using PL/SQL.

- Testing in support of projects and creation of project artifacts as required by project life cycle.
Qualifications
Qualifications:

- 5+ years of Hands-on experience in OFSAA v6.1 Profitability, FTP and GL Reconciliation modules.

- Good expertise in configuring allocation rules in OFSAA for cost allocation and revenue allocation for profitability management.

- Good expertise in configuring Transfer pricing rules in OFSAA FTP module.

- Good expertise in building T2T (Table to Table) transformations in OFSAA.

- 3+ years of expertise in developing forms with the help of OFSAA forms framework.

- 6+ years of experience writing and debugging complex SQL queries and Stored Procedures in Oracle database.

- In-depth understanding of Dimensions, hierarchies and attributes as it applies to OFSAA profitability modules.

- In-depth understanding of Data Warehousing concepts and dimensional modeling.

- Good understanding of functional aspects of profitability calculations.

- Working knowledge of OFSAA Run-Rule framework as it applies to Credit Risk application is a plus.

- 6+ years of experience working in the financial industry. Flexible in managing competing priorities and objectives

title: Node.js Developer / Architect
description:
Job Description:

The ideal candidate should possess a diverse skill set, ranging from microservices and API development to proficiency in Arabic and English. As a key contributor to our dynamic team, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining cutting-edge software solutions.

Job Title: Node.js Developer/Architect

Experience: 10-15 Years

Languages: Fluent in Arabic and English

Position Overview:

Qualifications:

  • Node.js: Mastery of Node.js for server-side development, contributing to the overall performance and scalability of backend services.
  • Microservices: Proven expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining microservices architecture, ensuring scalability and modularity.
  • Functional Programming: Familiarity with functional programming concepts, bringing innovative approaches to problem-solving and code efficiency.
  • Webworkers: Experience with Web Workers to enhance the performance of web applications and deliver seamless user experiences.
  • API Development: Demonstrated proficiency in creating robust APIs, ensuring efficient communication between different software components.
  • REST Web Services: Strong background in designing and implementing RESTful web services, adhering to best practices for web communication.
  • OOP Concepts: Solid understanding and application of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts to create scalable and maintainable code.
  • English (Critical): Exceptional proficiency in English, both written and verbal, is critical for effective communication within our global team and with stakeholders.
  • API Integration: Experience integrating third-party APIs and services, ensuring seamless connectivity and data exchange.
  • Git: Proficient in version control using Git, with the ability to collaborate effectively with team members using Git workflows.
  • Sveltekit: Familiarity with the SvelteKit framework, contributing to the development of efficient and interactive user interfaces.
  • Websockets: Expertise in implementing Websockets for real-time communication, enhancing the interactivity of web applications.
  • Next.js: Knowledge of Next.js for building server-side rendered and statically generated web applications.


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy high-quality software solutions.
  • Implement and maintain microservices architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility.
  • Apply functional programming concepts to enhance code quality and maintainability.
  • Develop and optimize APIs, adhering to industry best practices for web services.
  • Integrate third-party APIs to enhance application functionality.
  • Utilize Git for version control, following established workflows and collaborating effectively.
  • Contribute to the development of user interfaces using SvelteKit.
  • Implement Websockets for real-time communication in web applications.
  • Leverage Next.js for building server-side rendered and statically generated web applications.
  • Work with Node.js for efficient and scalable server-side development.
  • Ensure code quality through adherence to OOP concepts and best practices.
  • Exercise autonomy in project ownership, demonstrating a proactive and self-driven approach.

description:

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and weâ€™re far from reaching our full potential. Youâ€™ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

Creatives at ConsenSys make work that moves the crypto industry forward, spreading our leading-edge products far and wide into the world and pushing for the adoption of Web3 technology. Weâ€™re an ambitious team, using our unique point of view to create work that infiltrates crypto culture, influences mindsets, and prizes ourselves on being defiantly optimistic.
